channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #63 – Creating Children’s Apps and Simulating 2.5D Perspective in Corona SDK

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: LOL. I think you do just fine. Thanks for sharing some great info today. I like the part about how you create all the online properties before actually creating the app. That's smart!
item.content:encoded: LOL. I think you do just fine. Thanks for sharing some great info today. I like the part about how you create all the online properties before actually creating the app. That’s smart!

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Haha I am unbelievably awkward on camera. This is why I do development and not public interfacing. Please support my books so I don't have to get a job where the public has to look at me. http://www.maddiebearbooks.com/shop.html
item.content:encoded: Haha I am unbelievably awkward on camera. This is why I do development and not public interfacing. Please support my books so I don’t have to get a job where the public has to look at me. http://www.maddiebearbooks.com/shop.html
